Detailed Description

Read binary baselines (stored as C structs) on the input file and plot them. Structs & enums are defined in ssePdmInterface.h and sseInterface.h. Assumes the baseline structs are in network byte order.

Constructor.

Parameters:
frame the JFrame containing the GUI.
filename the input data file name.
width the width if the waterfall image window.
height the hieght if the waterfall image window.
pixelScaleFactor the scale factor.
pixelOffsetFactor the pixel offset of the image.
slowPlay if true display the data slowly to approximate the speed of the real time system.
useTimeAvg if true display the average over time.
